resources.string:
Thank you for your participation to Detect to improve the Geofencing it helps a lot! 

 All the data collected by this application online was erased and will be erased on this phone after clicking on the button below. 

 If you don't want to participate to further Beta experience to improve some specific point send me (Erwan) a message by teams to be remove from the beta list. Otherwise you will receive in the future an update of this App for a new test!
Clear app local data and quit
